name: East Midlands Trains, First Class - London St Pancras to Nottingham
description:
Join me on a 1h45 express trip up to Nottingham with East Midlands Trains. Boarding a Class 222 Meridian train, follow me on a typical first class journey. 

Includes highlights at St Pancras, all the lounge and service details, lunch service and everything else! As usual, I'll point out some of the things to see along the way. 

Leave me a comment if you like the video, and SUBSCRIBE! Don't miss out - I have dozens more videos to upload!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
